name: Timberland Spruce Mountain Waterproof Warm Lined Boots - Men's
categories: Spruce Mountain Waterproof Warm Lined Boots
description:
Waterproof, insulated boots that add a hit of plaid to your outfit. Recycled fleece linings and PrimaLoft insulation amp up the heat. Gippy lug outsoles permit crossing icy patches and packed snow without skidding.Uppers made from full grain leather and a blend of wool and recycled polyester.Waterproof breathable membrane keeps feet dry in any weather.200 gram PRIMALOFT® insulation maintains loft and retains warmth.Liners made from ReBOTL™ fabric that wick moisture away from the foot.Removeable anti-fatigue footbed provides all day comfort.Aggressive tread helps keep you anchored.Timberland’s ReBOTL material contains at least 50% recycled plastic, mainly from plastic bottles. To date Timberland has helped more than 445 metric tons of plastic waste find new life in their products.Leather comes from a leather tannery rated Silver or higher by a third-party environmental audit. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.

        Sustainability
